functions.meaning: Hierarchical equivalent of the physical representation of each subtype, compatible with CEN EN 13606 structures.
functions.name: as_hierarchy

meta_info.description: Abstract parent class of all data structure types. Includes the `_as_hierarchy_` function which can generate the equivalent CEN EN13606 single hierarchy for each subtype's physical representation. For example, the physical representation of an `ITEM_LIST` is `List<ELEMENT>`; its implementation of `_as_hierarchy_` will generate a `CLUSTER` containing the set of `ELEMENT` nodes from the list.
meta_info.name: DATA_STRUCTURE
